hero.title: Give New Life to Your Obsolete Material
hero.subtitle: ReStocked specializes in buying and selling obsolete construction machinery parts. We transform idle inventory into real value for your business.

about.title: About Us
about.paragraph1: ReStocked is an innovative company focused on solving a common problem in the construction sector: the accumulation of obsolete construction machinery parts that occupy warehouse space and represent idle capital.
about.paragraph2: Our mission is to give new life to this equipment, connecting companies that have idle material with those that need specific parts at affordable prices.
about.paragraph3: With operations in Portugal and international expansion plans, we are committed to creating a more efficient and sustainable market for construction equipment.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We offer complete solutions to manage your inventory of obsolete parts and equipment from construction machinery.

service1.title: Purchase of Obsolete Material
service1.description: We buy your idle inventory, freeing up space in your warehouse and generating immediate revenue.

service2.title: Sale of Used Parts
service2.description: We offer quality used parts at competitive prices, saving your maintenance budget.

service3.title: Inventory Management
service3.description: We help identify and manage obsolete parts in your inventory to maximize their value.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have obsolete material to sell or looking for specific parts? Get in touch with us.
